MS MCQs

    Introduction to Azure Cognitive Search

    »

    1. Which one of the following statements about query requests is true?

      All query composition is based on the full Lucene syntax

      Query requests include search criteria, but nothing for shaping search results

      Search explorer returns results in JSON only

      searchMode must be set to ON in order for queries to work


    2. Which of the following data sources can be used as an input data source?

      Azure Data Lake

      Azure Virtual Machines

      Azure SQL Database

      Azure Queue Storage


    3. Which data format is accepted by Azure Cognitive Search when you are pushing data to the service?

      CSV

      SQL

      XML

      JSON
